title: [转载][skript]EasyPlayerFreeze——这款Skript可让您冻结玩家[1.8-1.15]
author: FurryWorld
txt_content:
本帖最后由 FurryWorld 于 2020-4-2 12:54 编辑 

——————————————————————————This skript Reprinted to: hereSupport author, go to the original post to download=这个 skript 脚本转载至: here支持作者，前往原贴下载EasyPlayerFreeze [SKRIPT] 1.0这款Skript可让您冻结玩家！您也可以在拥有权限的情况下绕过冻结！
——————————————————————————
                 插件作者：GreenGamer42                 搬运者：FurryWorld                 搬运授权：已授权（贴尾贴出）                   请前往官网查看更新详情                 此贴仅做介绍，如遇更新请通过站内信私信我作者的话  Author's wordsThis Skript allows you to freeze players! You can also bypass the freeze with a permission!
WARNING: This plugin requires Skript and SkQuery to work!
SUPPORT: https://discord.gg/NYu4VST这个脚本允许你冻结玩家账号！您也可以在拥有权限的情况下绕过冻结！
警告： 这个插件需要 skript 和 skquery 进行运行
支持（联系作者）：https://discord.gg/NYu4VST特点  FEATURES- Freeze players!
- Unfreeze players!
- Bypass the freeze effect with one permission!
- No console spam!
- Reload command!
- Easy to use!冻结玩家解冻玩家拥有权限可以绕过冻结没有控制台报错拥有重载命令使用非常简单
设置  SET UP1: Download Skript here
2: Place Skript in your plugins folder
3: Restart the server
4: Download EasyWarps.sk
5: Go to your plugins folder and select skript, select scripts and place EasyWarps.sk in this folder
6: Restart your server and you are all done!
1： 在此处下载skcript
2： 将skript放入插件文件夹
3： 重新启动服务器
4： 下载EasyWarps.sk
5： 转到插件文件夹并打开skript，再打开scripts并将EasyWarps.sk放在此文件夹中
6： 重新启动服务器，您就完成了！命令  COMMAND- /freeze <player> - Freeze a player!
- /unfreeze <player> - Unfreeze a player!
- /EasyPlayerFreeze reload - Reload EasyPlayerFreeze!
- /EasyPlayerFreeze info - Show's the Skript information!
- /EasyPlayerFreeze help - Shows all the command!- /freeze <player> - 冻结玩家
- /unfreeze <player> - 解冻玩家
- /EasyPlayerFreeze reload - 重载此插件
- /EasyPlayerFreeze info - 查看插件信息
- /EasyPlayerFreeze help - 查看插件帮助权限  premissionsEasyPlayerFreeze.admin (All the /EasyStaffChat commands)
EasyPlayerFreeze.freeze (/Freeze <player>)
EasyPlayerFreeze.unfreeze (/Unfreeze <player>)
EasyPlayerFreeze.bypass (Bypasses the freeze)EasyPlayerFreeze.admin (所有的命令)
EasyPlayerFreeze.freeze (/Freeze <player>)
EasyPlayerFreeze.unfreeze (/Unfreeze <player>)
EasyPlayerFreeze.bypass (绕过账号冻结)
